steps.goal: Open TikTok and stop when one video is visible in the main feed. Do not open comments in this step.
Tap the comments button (speech bubble) for the current video. Stop only when the comments panel/list is visible. Do not scroll the main feed.

Keep the comments panel open. Find the third visible real user comment (ignore 'Add comment', filters, pinned headers, and ads). Tap the heart/like for that third comment only, then return done immediately.
